title: Kirarin☆Revolution (Kirarin Revolution)
synopsis: Kirari Tsukishima, a gluttonous 14-year-old beauty, is a girl who does not care about idols and the entertainment world because her mind is occupied by food. Her obsession with food only causes her to be clueless about love.
characters: ['Tsukishima, Kirari', 'Kazama, Hiroto', 'Naa-san', 'Hiwatari, Seiji', 'Mizuki, Hikaru', 'Tsukishima, Subaru', 'Naa-yan', 'Hanasaki, Cobeni', 'Yukino, Noel', 'Toudou, Fubuki']
voices: ['Kusumi, Koharu', 'Suyama, Akio', 'Ikeda, Chigusa', 'Hoshi, Souichirou', 'Hagiwara, Mai', 'Asanuma, Shintaro', 'Kikkawa, You', 'Kitahara, Sayaka', 'Shitaya, Noriko']
